comment.author: 30128498@N05
comment._content: Wonderful shot! 真棒！您照得非常好！ You are invited to add it to the ONLY Flickr group that is exclusively for “slice of life” photography of Chinese people taken in China: www.flickr.com/groups/chinese-currents PLEASE also add your own favourites (you can add up to 6 per day!) Thanks and best regards from Beijing.
comment.authorname: Chinese Currents - Tech issues in Beijing
